articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Meta launches Hyperscape, technology to turn real-world spaces into VR - TechCrunch
articles.description: Meta launches Hyperscape into beta, allowing users to turn real world spaces into digital spaces for VR.
articles.content: Although today’s Meta Connect developer conference was largely about new smart glasses, the social networking company did announce a handful of metaverse updates during Wednesday’s keynote. Of these,… [+1954 chars]
